obj.name: Desk
obj.action: print(You rummage through your desk, and find your house key.); give(house_key);
obj.used_dialogue: You rummage through your desk again, finding nothing.

obj.name: Cupboard
obj.verbs: gen/open/rummage through/look through/look into/look in/open the
obj.used_dialogue: You don't want to look through the cupboard again, you know you won't find anything useful in there.

obj.name: Bed
obj.verbs: gen/lie on/sit on/rest on/rest/lie upon/sleep on

obj.name: Cupboard
obj.verbs: gen/open/rummage through/look through/look into/look in/open the
obj.action_dia: You open the creaky door of your sibling's cupboard, and find their old green hat. You pick up the hat... and put it back. You think some things are best left forgotten.
obj.used_dialogue: You rummage through your sibling's cupboard again, finding nothing.

obj.name: Mirror
obj.action_dia: You look into the mirror. It looks very dark in there.

obj.name: Downstairs dresser
obj.action_dia: You rummage through the dresser, you find an old photograph. You pocket it.
obj.used_dialogue: You rummage through the dresser again, finding nothing.

obj.name: Bath
obj.action_dia: You lie in the bath. You sit in it for a second or two, waiting. After a few more seconds of waiting, the memories assault you.

obj.name: Open box
obj.verbs: gen/open/rummage through/look through/look into/look in/open the
obj.action_dia: You rifle through the box, and take out a bath bomb.
obj.used_dialogue: You rifle through the box again, but nothing specific jumps out at you.

obj.name: Door switch
obj.verbs: gen/flick on/turn on/flick the/flick/press/press the/press on/click the/click/click on
obj.aliases: door switch/the switch/button/light switch/door button/garage door/garage button/garage switch

obj.name: Garage shelves
obj.action_dia: You search through the shelves, finding a tiny toy gun that fires little foam bullets. You pocket the little gun, and three foam bullets.
obj.used_dialogue: You search through the shelves again, finding nothing of interest.

obj.name: Kitchen cupboard
obj.action_dia: You open the kitchen cupboard, and stacks and stacks of old, forgotten cookery fall out at you. You jump back in suprise, but not fast enough to prevent one of the plates from clipping your knee and shattering. You stand away from the cupboard, admiring the mess on the floor.
obj.used_dialogue: You look at the mess of broken crockery on the floor, unwilling to approach the area of incident further.

obj.name: Weird jar
obj.action_dia: You pick up the jar off the counter, and examine it, it's full of a cloudy green liquid, you can't quite make out the inside of it. You try and open it, but you can't quite manage it. You decide instead to carry it with you.
obj.aliases: unknown jar/weird jar/kitchen counter jar/the jar/jar/kitchen jar/strange jar/unknown substance jar

obj.name: Magic Portal
obj.action_dia: you move through the magic portal
obj.item_dia: you try and go through, but it doesnt exist yet
